about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Mother's Day 2022 shop] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Balloon Flowers
  • Hanging Flower Balls
  • Bouquet Neon
  • Fig Tree Pot
  • Party Side Table
  • Valentina's Vase
  • Sleepy Bears
  • Table Flower Basket
  • Tulip Accent Wall
  • Lilipad Box

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
